title: Disney Princesses
description: How well do you know the Disney Princess lineup?

questions.question: Which princess has the power to heal with her hair?
questions.explanation: Rapunzel's magical golden hair has healing powers when she sings, a gift from a magical flower!

questions.question: Moana is officially a Disney Princess.
questions.explanation: While Moana is a Disney heroine, she hasn't been officially coronated into the Disney Princess lineup. She's the daughter of a chief!

questions.question: What does Cinderella leave behind at the ball?
questions.explanation: Cinderella loses her glass slipper while fleeing the ball at midnight, which the Prince uses to find her!

questions.question: Which princess pretends to be a man to join the army?
questions.explanation: Mulan disguises herself as a man named 'Ping' to take her father's place in the Chinese army!

questions.question: Belle's favorite thing to do is read books.
questions.explanation: Belle is known for her love of reading and is considered odd by her village for being a bookworm!

questions.question: What is Princess Tiana's dream in The Princess and the Frog?
questions.explanation: Tiana works hard to save money for her own restaurant, 'Tiana's Place', to honor her father's dream!

questions.question: Which princess has a pet tiger named Rajah?
questions.explanation: Princess Jasmine's loyal pet and protector is Rajah, a Bengal tiger who lives in the palace!

questions.question: Aurora from Sleeping Beauty is also known as Briar Rose.
questions.explanation: Princess Aurora was raised by the three fairies under the name Briar Rose to hide her from Maleficent!
